idea-plugin.name: Vertical Align
idea-plugin.description:
Allows you to indent multiplie cursors with spaces.
Create a multicursor, press `Alt+Shift+T` and cursors will be aligned with the rightmost one.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Removed selection behaviour as it seemed useless for me.

Fixed minor compatibility issues:
• default change-notes in default build.gradle,
• added a dependency on the most generic IntelliJ package.

action.description: Vertically aligns several multicursors to match rightmost one's position
